#summary questionList
#labels free,cms,freecms,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= questionList =
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px"><strong style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px"><em style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">从<span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">FreeCMS 1.2<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></span>开始支持</em></strong></p>
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px">根据参数提取评论对象。</p>
<p>
<table style="border-right: medium none; padding-right: 0px; border-top: medium none; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; border-left: medium none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: medium none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="1">
    <tbody>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					参数</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					说明</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					id</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					网上调查id</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					name</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					名称</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					nameLen</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					从FreeCMS 1.3 开始支持</p>
				<p>
					名称显示长度</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					selecttype</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					选择类型 空字符串表示所有(默认) 0单选 1多选</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					order</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					排序 </p>
				<p>
					1时间倒序</p>
				<p>
					2时间正序</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					isok</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					有效 空字符串表示所有(默认) 0无效 1有效</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					num</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					数量</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					cache</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					是否使用缓存，默认为false</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
</p>
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px"> </p>
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px"> </p>
<p>
<table style="border-right: medium none; padding-right: 0px; border-top: medium none; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; border-left: medium none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: medium none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="1">
    <tbody style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">
        <tr style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">
            <td style="border-right: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-right: 0px; border-top: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; border-left: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: windowtext 1pt solid">
            <p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; padding-top: 0px; letter-spacing: 1px"><strong style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px"><span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px; font-family: 宋体">返回值</span></strong></p>
            </td>
            <td style="border-right: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-right: 0px; border-top: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; border-left: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: windowtext 1pt solid">
            <p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; padding-top: 0px; letter-spacing: 1px"><strong style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px"><span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px; font-family: 宋体">说明</span></strong></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">
            <td style="border-right: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-right: 0px; border-top: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; border-left: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: windowtext 1pt solid">
            <p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; padding-top: 0px; letter-spacing: 1px"><span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px; font-family: 宋体">commentList</span></p>
            </td>
            <td style="border-right: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-right: 0px; border-top: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; border-left: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: windowtext 1pt solid">
            <p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; padding-top: 0px; letter-spacing: 1px"><span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px; font-family: 宋体">评论对象列表，类型为<span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">List<</span>数据对象<span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">comment></span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">
            <td style="border-right: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-right: 0px; border-top: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; border-left: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: windowtext 1pt solid">
            <p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; padding-top: 0px; letter-spacing: 1px"><span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px; font-family: 宋体">pager</span></p>
            </td>
            <td style="border-right: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-right: 0px; border-top: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; border-left: windowtext 1pt solid; padding-top: 0px; border-bottom: windowtext 1pt solid">
            <p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; padding-top: 0px; letter-spacing: 1px"><span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px; font-family: 宋体">分页对象</span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
</p>
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px"> </p>
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px"><strong style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">示例<span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">1</span></strong></p>
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px">分页提取评论，每页显示<span style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px">10</span>条。</p>
<p style="padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; word-spacing: 0px; font: 14px/1.5 Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; text-transform: none; color: rgb(0,0,0); text-indent: 0px; padding-top: 0px; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: rgb(255,255,255); text-align: left; orphans: auto; widows: auto; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px">

{{{
<@questionList num="2";question,index>

${index} : ${question.name}<br>

</@questionList>
